content: total round 2 k to end heel turn repeat rnds 1 & 2 until 24 sts remain cut yarn leaving a 12 inch / 30 cm tail graft sts together using kitchener row 1 rs sl1 k til 13 15 sts remain ssk k1 turn stitch weave in ends and block row 2 ws sl1 p til 13 15 sts remain p2tog p1 turn 2 @twinsetandpurl ©rachel fletcher 2022 #jomosocks
